languages.text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

languages.text: 装备者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}都会施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（4）。装备者施加的所有流血效果层数都额外提高2层。
languages.original_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: 装备者的所有{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}都会施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}（6）。 ！此装备只能由黑暗灵族装备。

languages.text: Все атаки персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} накладывают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g} (4). Все эффекты кровотечения, накладываемые персонажем, усиливаются на 2.
languages.original_text: All the wearer's melee attacks inflict bleeding (6). ! Can only be equipped by drukhari.

traits.locale_text: Все атаки персонажа в ближнем бою накладывают эффект кровотечения (6). ! Может использоваться только друкари.
Все атаки персонажа в ближнем бою накладывают эффект кровотечения (6). ! Может использоваться только друкари.

languages.text: 使用者の全ての{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}効果を与える(4)。使用者が与える出血効果は全て、威力が2増加する。
languages.original_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: 使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}がすべて{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g} (6) を与える。 ！デュカーリのみが装備可能。

languages.text: Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador causan {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (4). Los efectos de hemorragia infligidos por el portador ganan +2 a su poder.
languages.original_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: Todos los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del portador causan {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} (6). ! Solo la puede equipar un drukhari.

languages.text: Alle {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (4). Alle vom Träger verursachten Blutungseffekte haben eine um +2 erhöhte Kraft.
languages.original_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: Alle {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} des Trägers verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} (6). Kann nur von Drukhari ausgerüstet werden!

languages.text: Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (4). La puissance de tous les effets de Saignement infligés par l'utilisateur est augmentée de +2.
languages.original_text: All the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} (4). All bleeding effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (6). ! Uniquement utilisable par les Drukhari.
Toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'utilisateur infligent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} (6). ! Uniquement utilisable par les Drukhari.
